documents.document:
Use 80/20 Rule for Happier Work Life

http://www.onlywire.com/r/91482395

Happiness is ultimately what we seek. No matter what we do, we actually at the most basic want to be happy and be loved. If you think you don't have enough time, money, or whatever to do what makes you happy. Consider using the 80/20 rule to make yourself happier on the job and off. Spend more time doing what you love and getting paid for it.

Meditation - You Can't Do It Wrong

http://happierthanever.com/meditation-you-cant-do-it-wrong/

The most challenging may be meditation. Most of us pray and know we “should” meditate yet find it weird, confusing or requiring too much spiritual discipline. What a relief to now have hard science to tell us we can’t do it wrong. There are many paths to that mindful connection with our inner selves…and the right one is the way we are drawn to go.

Read more: http://happierthanever.com/meditation-you-cant-do-it-wrong/#ixzz210nuetGl

More Proof Meditation Improves Brain Function

http://happierthanever.com/more-proof-meditation-improves-brain-function/

The evidence keeps mounting up that we are not imagining the benefits of meditation.

Researchers at the University of Oregon have released a study showing only four weeks of meditation yielded measurable increases in “gray matter” within our brains.

Yi-Yuan Tang and Michael Posner reported improved mood changes as well in the Early Edition of the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences.

Read more: http://happierthanever.com/more-proof-meditation-improves-brain-function/#ixzz210oJUsba

Is Kate Upton Fat?

http://www.onlywire.com/r/92711254

Kate Upton is a fabulously successful young model, known for her girl next door face and curvy body perfect for swimsuit shoots and dancing in a bikini in viral Youtube videos.

What's not too like? Her curves! A blogger named Skinnygurl posted an all out attack on her site Skinny Gossip.

How to Clear Clutter the 80/20 Way

http://www.onlywire.com/r/95601399

You may have heard of Pareto’s Law. Whatever you are doing, approximately 80% of the benefit comes from 20% of the effort. A business earns 80% of its sales from 20% of its customers. You call 20% of your friends 80% of the time.

It applies to clutter, too. You use 20% of your possessions 80% of the time. This makes it a lot easier to zero in on unnecessary items and their natural collecting point….closets. After all, you can always shove in more and forget it.

Read more: http://happierthanever.com/how-to-clear-clutter-the-8020-way/#ixzz22p7oXXXy

The 80/20 Way to Happiness

http://webpages.scu.edu/lorlando/?q=content/8020-way-happiness

What Makes You Happy?
Are you doing it? If not, why not?
If you’re like me, you could come up with endless stories and "good" reasons that seem to make sense...as long as you accept the premise that we don’t get to do what we want…or have to wait for “some day” which by definition cannot ever arrive and become today.

Happiness

http://zoomation.asu.edu/node/7200

What is happiness? It's an inner state, the way we feel right now, no matter is what is happening around us. It's independent of what are people are doing. It's the way are are on earth and he way we experience everything around us.

7 Surprising Ways to Feel Happier Right Now

http://www.onlywire.com/r/95606084

Anyone in the world

All of us have days when we're out of sorts. You just wish you were in a better mood. You've had days like that, haven't you? Perhaps you tried to get yourself into a better state of mind but struggled to achieve it.

Sometimes we get stuck in our own emotional dumps and forget how easy it is to feel happier, so here are seven simple ways to lift your mood. Many people have found them useful. Some of them may surprise you!

How to Earn and Use Airline Miles

http://freetravelkarma.com/airline-miles/

The first step in Free Travel Karma is collecting airline miles and learning how to use them for maximum value. Airline miles have become an alternative currency since the launch of American AAdvantage in 1981. The program was an immediate success and copied within a week by rival United Airlines MileagePlus.

How to Dine Out for Free Travel

http://www.onlywire.com/r/96492939

You can earn miles by signing IF you sign up a credit card with one or more of the member programs and use that same credit card to pay at a member restaurant. Base rate is 3 miles/dollar and 5 miles/diollar after 12 annual transactions in the same program. Priority Club and Hilton Hotels award 5 points/dollar and 8 points/dollar at the 12-dine level.

Look Younger With a Lactic Acid Peel

http://www.squidoo.com/look-five-years-younger-for-pennies

A lactic acid peel is alpha hydroxy (AHA) in various concentrations applied to clean skin for up to seven minutes. I recommend starting with a mild 40% solution which is quickly washed off, the skin is normalized with a Ph Prep solution and left fresh, glowing and free or dead cells and minor sun damage.

The Game of Life

http://www.squidoo.com/the-game-of-life-and-how-to-play-it

This masterpiece is still in print 90 years later and in every library, inspiring us to pray, love, give and forgive as we play The Game of Life to win.

How to Lose Weight Without Trying

http://www.squidoo.com/how-to-lose-weight-without-trying

Some women do anything they want and stay thin. Slender people don't usually spend grueling hours working out and eating tasteless shakes and or puny frozen dinners. Their thinness is usually a lifestyle choice. Learn how they banish that four letter-word DIET!!

Are You Ever Paralyzed by Procrastination?

http://www.onlywire.com/r/96640043

One thing at a time is all you can get done! That includes the things you used to do, things you truly must do and things you definitely should do…and they are all fighting with the new things you started that seemed such a good idea at the time.

You have too much to do, literally, and spend more time rewriting endless lists than doing any of them. You’re stressed, confused and probably not sleeping enough, thinking that will help. But it doesn’t. You get further and further behind.

How to Play the Game of Life

http://happierthanever.com/how-to-play-the-game-of-life/

Long before Norman Vincent Peale wrote about The Power of Positive Thinking or The Secret told us we can have anything we can imagine, Florence Scovel Shinn self-published the classic “The Game of Life and How to Play It” in 1925.

Shinn was a pioneer of motivational thinking who took the universal truths in the Bible and translated them into her inspiring work, “The Game of Life and How to Play It.”

What is The Game of Life? Shinn tells us, ”Jesus Christ taught that it was a great game of Giving and Receiving.”

Read more: http://happierthanever.com/how-to-play-the-game-of-life/#ixzz28Oq7feb7

Solve Your Problems With A Glass of Water

http://happierthanever.com/how-to-solve-problems-with-a-glass-of-water/

Choose something you know you CAN do but haven’t because you’ve hit a roadblock. As your skills and confidence in the technique improve, you can move on to major matters like a new career.

solve problems with a glass of waterPour yourself a small glass just before bed. Then visualize your problem, hold the glass in both hands, close your eyes and look upward to the spot between your eyes (your “third eye”).

Drink half the water while you think, “This is all that is needed to find a solution to my problem.”

How to Choose Miracles

http://happierthanever.com/choose-miracles/

A miracle is a gift, the gift of the unexpected, the gift you did not create or deserve. A miracle arrives – quite predictably – when you are ready to receive it. The Universe is a a marvelous open air market, matching givers with receivers every day. You can create the space for miracles to happen by living in the Miracle Zone, a place where anything can happen – and does! Be ready to receive, and your giver will appear.

Read more: http://happierthanever.com/choose-miracles/#ixzz28OqhWtCS

Worrying About Money

http://onlywire.com/r/85517934

I completely understand, and I need money, too! I wish I could tell you to imagine dollar bills falling on your head! Or write $10,000 checks to yourself. Or pay for lots of programs to hypnotize yourself into believing cash will come pouring in the door. There's nothing wrong with doing any of those things. It can all feel very good! But if you want ANYTHING in life to happen, you already know that you have to take action.

June America Meditating June 9

http://happierthanever.com/join-america-meditating-june-9/

What a beautiful reminder that the kingdom of God is within us! I'm thrilled to share Sister Jenna’s nationwide “America Meditates” initiative which will take place Saturday June 9th. She asks we take just a moment at 7 am and 7 pm Saturday to join in peaceful thoughts and make it a daily tradition.

Meditation Improves Problem Solving

http://onlywire.com/r/87772320

A new study reported in Life Science shows that meditation provides enhanced problem-solving abilities, even to complete beginners.

Clear Clutter with a Feng Shui Trash Day

http://www.onlywire.com/r/89449084

I’ve found a magic tool in the battle against clutter. I call it the Feng Shui Trash Day. If you do it for nine days, it will declutter your home and clear space for wonderful surprises!

Clear Clutter with a Feng Shui Trash Day

http://www.onlywire.com/r/89449084

I’ve found a magic tool in the battle against clutter. I call it the Feng Shui Trash Day. If you do it for nine days, it will declutter your home and clear space for wonderful surprises!

The 80/20 Way to Happiness

http://happierthanever.com/the-8020-way-to-happiness/

20% of what you do brings 80% of your happiness. That's why learning and applying the 80/20 Rule can make you happier than ever before.

The 80/20 Way to Happiness

http://happierthanever.com/the-8020-way-to-happiness/

20% of what you do brings 80% of your happiness. That's why learning and applying the 80/20 Rule can make you happier than ever before.
